short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Appends DynMap links to usernames on tildes.net

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds status indicators for the tildes.net Minecraft server that show when a user is online. When the status indicator is clicked a new browser tab is opened that highlight's the player's in-game location.
